description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is MrWilson, with a comment on our post about ChatGPT and privacy rights in Europe, specifically in response to someone who raised the issue of “false light” torts: False light is a privacy tort in the US. We’re talking about Europe. But also, false light […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
